english.segment1: [Verse 1:]. Salvation rise. As we sing of Your freedom. We leave the past behind. As we look to Your kingdom
english.segment2: [Verse 2:]. You bridge the great divide. Between our hearts and Your glory. Our shame dissolved. In the depths of Your mercy
english.segment3: [Pre-Chorus:]. We are devoted. We are devoted to You
english.segment4: [Chorus:]. Your light will shine in the darkness. Your light will shine in the dark. In the dark. Woah. We are Yours
english.segment5: [Verse 3:]. We fill the open skies. With the sound of Your praises. Our future lies in the hope of our Saviour
english.segment6: [Bridge:]. It's Your love. Your love. Woah woah. It's Your love. Your love. Woah woah
